chapter.title: Motivation
chapter.para: The multi-vendor character of 'UnitedLinux' requires the split of the single vendor installation media we now have, to a "base media" (containing the basic UnitedLinux system) and "product media" (containing the product, i.e. an email server application).
YaST must be able to handle both medias and resolve (package) dependencies between them.
This document describes the requirements and implementation details of the package handling toolset implemented for UnitedLinux.
